description: This pathway describes transcription factor-microRNA circuits governing cholesterol and lipid homeostasis. It is based on a seminar by Dr. Anders Näär.  Proteins on this pathway have targeted assays available via the [CPTAC Assay Portal](https://assays.cancer.gov/available_assays?wp_id=WP2011).
title: SREBF and miR33 in cholesterol and lipid homeostasis
